mapper.select: SELECT call_case_id, `name`, case_price, call_start_time, answer_time, call_end_time, call_number, voice_path, outbound_type FROM outbound_call_result WHERE call_type in(3,6) AND call_status ='normalConnection' AND company_id=#{companyId} AND role_id=#{roleId} AND call_end_time >=#{start} AND call_end_time <=#{end} ORDER BY call_end_time

SELECT call_case_id, `name`, case_price, call_start_time, answer_time, call_end_time, call_number, voice_path, outbound_type FROM outbound_call_result WHERE call_type in(3,6) AND call_status ='normalConnection' AND company_id=#{companyId} AND call_end_time >=#{start} AND call_end_time <=#{end} ORDER BY call_end_time
